name: orpg
description: A LAN-friendly multiplayer tabletop RPG host built on FastAPI, WebSockets, and structured LLM calls. oRPG keeps a shared world state, lets players join from a browser, and can enrich every turn with auto-generated images, voice narration, and concise history summaries. It currently supports Google Gemini, OpenAI, and xAI Grok text models plus optional ElevenLabs speech synthesis.
